Description:
Fortify +1 per charge.
In addition to this, upon reaching 2 charges, blocking damage grants 10 Shield.
Upon reaching 3 charges, blocking damage also grants 10 Shield to all allies.
DescriptionExtended:
Fortify +1 per charge.
In addition to this, upon reaching 2 charges, blocking damage grants 10 Shield.
Upon reaching 3 charges, blocking damage also grants 10 Shield to all allies.
Maximum charges 3. Can't be purged unless specified.
